param.name: moduleclass_sfx
param.label: Module Class Suffix
param.description: A suffix to be applied to the css class of the module (table.moduletable), this allows individual module styling

param.name: cache
param.label: Caching
param.description: Select whether to cache the content of this module

param.name: cache_time
param.label: Cache Time
param.description: The time before the module is recached

param.name: catid
param.label: Enter the ID of the slideshow category
param.description: Enter the ID of the slideshow category

param.name: engine
param.label: Choose Slideshow Engine?
param.description: Choose appropriately to avoid any javascript issues with other extensions or even your template!

param.name: disablelib
param.label: Disable core library?
param.description: If you are using other scripts on your site which already include either Mootools or jQuery, you might consider setting this option to 'yes', in case you are faced with javascript conflicts. This option will not work if you choose the 'Compress JS code using PHP' option below.

param.name: optimizejs
param.label: Compress JS code using PHP?
param.description: Improve your site's performance by enabling this feature. PHP compresses JS code and minimizes page load times. This includes both the core JS library and the slideshow engine. Please note that some servers may not support this feature.

param.name: fpss_template
param.label: Template
param.description: Choose the output template of the module. Frontpage Slideshow comes prepacked with 8 available templates to choose from.

param.name: width
param.label: Slideshow Width
param.description: The width of the slideshow displaying on your site.

param.name: height
param.label: Slideshow Height
param.description: The height of the slideshow displaying on your site.

param.name: sidebar_width
param.label: Sidebar Width (applies to certain FPSS templates only)
param.description: Width of the sidebar in pixels. Concerns the 'Uncut', 'FSD', 'Movies' and 'Sleek' templates by default. This width will be added to the overall width of the slideshow or otherwise.

param.name: hide_nav
param.label: Hide navigation bar?
param.description: Choose if you want to show or hide the navigation bar at the bottom of the slideshow.

param.name: delay
param.label: Slide Delay
param.description: Pause between slides in ms.

param.name: speed
param.label: Slideshow Speed
param.description: Slide transition time in ms.

param.name: loadingTime
param.label: Preloader image delay time
param.description: Time in milliseconds. 1000 is 1 second.

param.name: autoSlide
param.label: Autostart slideshow
param.description: Choose whether the slideshow will start or hold on page load.

param.name: random
param.label: Display slides randomly?
param.description: Random display of the slides.

param.name: limitslides
param.label: Limit slides being displayed to...
param.description: This option can be very useful if you have for example 30 slides on your slideshow but only want to show 10 at a time. You input '10' in this case and only 10 slides will appear. If you combine this option with the 'random' feature right above, you'll get a smart display feature for your slideshow. By default this option is empty to enable display of all slides.

param.name: rotateAction
param.label: Slides should switch on...
param.description: Choose how slides switch when using the navigation.

param.name: mtCTRtext_effect
param.label: Use text transition effect?
param.description: Adds a nice transition for text when switching between slides.

param.name: mtCTRtransitionText
param.label: Text transition effect time
param.description: Applies only if you've selected 'Yes' to the above option. Time in milliseconds. 1000 is 1 second.

param.name: words
param.label: Word limit
param.description: Word limit. Enter 0 to disable it.

param.name: chars
param.label: Character limit
param.description: Character limit

param.name: striptags
param.label: Cleanup HTML tags from text?
param.description: If you choose 'Yes' then all HTML tags will be stripped from the main text of your slide, except the tags specified in the mod_fpss.php file.

param.name: showtitle
param.label: Show title
param.description: Show title

param.name: showseccat
param.label: Show section/category (if applicable)
param.description: Show section/category (if applicable)

param.name: showcustomtext
param.label: Show custom text/introtext
param.description: Show custom text/introtext

param.name: showplaintext
param.label: Show tagline text
param.description: Show tagline text

param.name: showreadmore
param.label: Show 'read more...' link
param.description: Show 'read more...' link

param.name: nolink
param.label: Disable all slide links
param.description: Disable all slide links
